name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PolyBox - ChatGPT launcher and prompts, search tabs, bookmarks, history

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly launch ChatGPT to ask anything and manage prompts library. Access search engines, tabs, bookmarks, history and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
âœ¨ğ—–ğ—µğ—®ğ˜ğ—šğ—£ğ—§ ğ—Ÿğ—®ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—°ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿âœ¨
Provides quick and streamlined access to ChatGPT. Launch the search box and ask question from anywhere. Additional integration capabilities include adding and managing your custom prompt shortcuts library.
      â€¢ /chatgpt or ? : Start typing your question to begin the conversation
      â€¢ /chatgpt /translate, /chatgpt /summarize, ... : Create shortcuts for you frequently used prompts
      â€¢ ChatGPT history search and support for other AI chat websites are coming soon!

Search everything in your browser, including opened tabs, bookmarks, history, downloads, short URLs, quick commands and more.
      â€¢ access and switch to any search engine (Google, Bing, Yahoo, DuckDuckGo...) seamlessly
      â€¢ /tab or # : Search all opened tabs
      â€¢ /bookmarks or * : Search bookmarks
      â€¢ /history or ~ : Search browsing history
      â€¢ /downloads or ! : Search downloaded files
      â€¢ /extensions or % : Search installed extensions
      â€¢ /settings : Search browser settings
      ...

Set up short URL mappings and search URL templates to navigate to or search your favorite websites by typing a few letters. For example,
      â€¢ type `yt` to go to YouTube
      â€¢ type `/yt music` to search music on YouTube
      â€¢ type `my-product-design` to go to a Google Doc you've set up the mapping for

Type less to achieve more:
      â€¢ built-in calculator
      â€¢ full keyboard navigation support
      â€¢ mute/unmute tabs
      â€¢ sort - Sort tabs in current window
      â€¢ dedupe - Close duplicated tabs in all windows
      â€¢ urls - Copy tab URLs in current window
      â€¢ rands - Generate a random string
